info.title: Nounou Nutrition API
info.description: A comprehensive nutrition tracking API with MongoDB backend supporting unified food and recipe consumption tracking.

tags.name: Health
tags.description: Health check and system status endpoints

tags.name: Users
tags.description: User management, authentication, and profile operations

tags.name: Foods
tags.description: Food database management and search functionality

tags.name: Recipes
tags.description: Recipe creation, management, and ingredient handling

tags.name: Consumption
tags.description: Unified food and recipe consumption tracking and analytics

bearerAuth.name: Authorization
bearerAuth.description: Enter your bearer token in the format: Bearer {token}
